location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is written from Bombay. Stannus requests payment of a bill for articles to the amount of 2473.2 rupees in return for a present of nearly equal value received from the Imam of Muscat.
